section.heading: Restriction on collecting fines after 10 years.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C.Law 22-175: § 3 of D.C.Law 22-175 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(e) of D.C.Law 22-175 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C.Law 22-175: § 3 of D.C.Law 22-175 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(e) of D.C.Law 22-175 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
